workflow_tags: data cleaning, data standardization, statistical sampling, statistical tests
domain_knowledge: The data from this ML requirements survey may include negative numbers, which could indicate no response. Negative values or -99 may signify NA and have to be excluded.

datasets.name: requirements_engineering_for_ML-enabled_systems.csv
datasets.description: Survey responses detailing the roles, techniques, and documentation practices associated with requirements in ML-enabled system projects.

raw.name: ID
raw.description: The unique identifier for each respondent.

raw.name: Status
raw.description: The current status of the respondent

raw.name: Duration
raw.description: The duration of the respondent's involvement

raw.name: D1_Undergraduation
raw.description: Undergraduate (e.g., Computer Science, Statistics)

raw.name: D1_Specialization
raw.description: Specialization (e.g., Data Science specialization, Project Management specialization)

raw.name: D1_Master
raw.description: Master (e.g., M.Sc. in Computer Science, M.Sc. in Economics)

raw.name: D1_Phd
raw.description: Ph.D. (e.g., Ph.D. in Computer Science, Ph.D. in Mathematics)

raw.name: D1_Courses
raw.description: Professional ML Certifications/Courses (e.g., Google Professional ML Engineer Certification, Coursera/Udacity course on ML)

raw.name: D1_Others
raw.description: Other course specified by respondent

raw.name: D2_Country
raw.description: Country in which the respondent is currently working

raw.name: D3_Company_Size
raw.description: Size of the organization the respondent currently work for (1-10 employees, 11-50 employees ... more than 2000 employees)

raw.name: D4_Role
raw.description: Role that best describes the respondent's current activities within the company (Project Lead/ Project Manager, business Analyst, Requirements Engineer, Solution Architect, Data Scientist, Developer, Test Manager / Tester)

raw.name: D4_Role_Others
raw.description: Other role specified by respondent

raw.name: D5_Software_Experience
raw.description: Years of experience in working with the development of software based products

raw.name: D6_ML_Experience
raw.description: Years of Experience in developing ML-enabled systems

raw.name: D7_Total_ML_Projects
raw.description: Number of ML-enabled system projects that the respondent participated in

raw.name: D8_ML_Production
raw.description: Number of ML-enabled system projects that the respondent participated in that actually got deployed

raw.name: D9_ML_Project_Team_Size
raw.description: The Team size of the ML-enabled system projects that the respondent participated in

queries.question: What proportion of respondents mentioned that requirements in ML-enabled system projects are not documented at all, with a confidence interval of 16.917% (95% CI [16.632, 17.201]) after bootstrapping for statistical significance?
